NAME: Amit Jain
ABOUT:
I have a rich experience of more than 14 years to my credit, having worked with some of the best Cement, Pharma and FMCG Companies.
I am currently working with La Renon Healthcare Pvt. Ltd. Prior to La Renon, I was working with Zydus Wellness Limited (A Listed Zydus Group Company) as a Chief Financial Officer. 
I started my career with Sanghi Industries Ltd. and then worked with Sparta Cements and Chemicals Ltd. 
In this 14+ years, I have won the following awards:
1.	Business Today Best CFO Award 2012 - under the category of Consistent Liquidity Management. The Award has been given by then Honorable Union Finance Minister Shri Pranab Mukharjee. 

2.	CFO 100 Roll of Honour 2013. The Award has been given by Shri Koushik Chatterjee, Group CFO, Tata Steel.

3.  CFO 100 Roll of Honour 2014. The Award has been given by Shri Bharat Doshi, Ex. Group CFO & Executive Director, Mahindra & Mahindra.

4. "2014 CA CFO - FMCG Sector" from Institute of Chartered Accountants of India.

5. "Special Recognition and Appreciation" from the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India
